Adjusted custom options and improved tooltips

※ Changes compared to the first server are marked in red.

· Conditions and penalties for some custom options are deleted.
· Fixed option epic options related to the option will also be changed.
· Damage increase and buff power options are displayed based on option level 1 of 105 Lv equipment.
· Highlight is added to some options that were not highlighted.
· Hashtag composition is adjusted to the changed options.
· Final damage increase and attack power increase hashtags will be deleted.
